gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bucks 129, Mavericks 117
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bucks defeated the Mavericks, 129-117. Giannis Antetokounmpo recorded 48 points, 10 assists, and five steals for the Bucks, with Damian Lillard adding 30 points (10-11 FG) and eight assists in the victory. Luka Doncic tallied 40 points, 11 assists, and nine rebounds for the Mavericks in the losing effort. The Bucks improve to 33-16, while the Mavericks fall to 26-23.
